articles.description: The company's revenue rose 3.5% on-year to ₹625.8 crore in the September quarter. The Board has also declared an interim dividend of ₹10 per share for the financial year 2023-24. The record date for the same has been fixed as November 17.

articles.author: India Today Business Desk
articles.title: Gold, silver price today, November 7, 2023: Precious metals witness dip on MCX - India Today
articles.description: Gold Price Today 7 November 2023: Both gold and silver are trading on the lower side of the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) on Tuesday. Check the latest city-wise prices here.
articles.content:
For the second day in a row, both gold and silver prices recorded a dip on the Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX) on Tuesday, November 7, 2023.

articles.title: Devyani International Q2: Net profit falls 37% to Rs 35.82 crore, revenue up 9.63% - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Total revenue of the company is Rs 819.47 crore, rising 9.63 percent.
articles.content:
Devyani International Ltd on November 7 reported a consolidated profit of Rs 35.82 crore for the September quarter of FY24, falling 36.9 percent from Rs 56.83 crore in the year ago period.

articles.author: Trade Brains
articles.title: Cable stock jumps up to 6% after net profit increases by 111%; Plans on opening branch office in Dubai - Trade Brains
articles.description: The shares of one of India’s largest exporters of wires and cables rose 6 percent to Rs 1,490 per share after the company board approved the opening of a branch office in Dubai, followed by strong Q2 results.
